sense.gloss: to be decided, to be settled, to be fixed, to be arranged
to be unchanging, to be the same (as always), to be fixed, to be set
to be a fixed rule, to be destined, to be a convention, to be a custom, to be common knowledge
to be well executed (of a manoeuvre in a sport, game, etc.), to go well, to succeed, to connect (of a punch)
to look good (of clothing), to look sharp, to be stylish, to suit one, to be held in place (of a hairdo)
to be struck and held (of a pose in kabuki)

sdata.j: ↑価格↑↓かかく↓は↑需要↑↓じゅよう↓と↑供給↑↓きょうきゅう↓によって↑決↑↓|き↓まる|。
sdata.e: Prices depend on supply and demand.

sdata.j: ↑価格↑↓かかく↓はコストと↑需要↑↓じゅよう↓で↑決↑↓|き↓まる|。
sdata.e: Price depends on costs and demand.

sdata.j: ↑意志↑↓いし↓↑疎通↑↓そつう↓のはかり↑方↑↓かた↓は、↑文化↑↓ぶんか↓によって↑決↑↓|き↓まる|からである。
sdata.e: Knowing their languages is not enough to communicate effectively, because the methods of communication are determined by their cultures.

sdata.j: たいていの↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑一生↑↓いっしょう↓は↑環境↑↓かんきょう↓で↑決↑↓|き↓まる|。
sdata.e: The lives of most people are determined by their environment.

sdata.j: それはあなたが、↑関心↑↓かんしん↓があるかどうかによって↑決↑↓|き↓まる|のです。
sdata.e: That depends on whether you are interested or not.

sdata.j: それからその↑路線↑↓ろせん↓の↑通↑↓とお↓る↑最良↑↓さいりょう↓の↑道筋↑↓みちすじ↓を↑決↑↓き↓める↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がある。それは↑何↑↓なに↓よりもその↑路線↑↓ろせん↓が↑通↑↓とお↓る↑地形↑↓ちけい↓によって↑決↑↓|き↓まる|。
sdata.e: It then became necessary to settle the best route for the line to follow; and that was determined, in the first place, by the shape of the land it had to cross.

sdata.j: カーペットの↑値段↑↓ねだん↓は↑３↑↓みっ↓つの↑要素↑↓ようそ↓で↑決↑↓|き↓まる|。
sdata.e: The price of the carpet is determined by three factors.

sdata.j: ↑作物↑↓さくもつ↓の↑出来↑↓でき↓↑不出来↑↓ふでき↓は↑試合↑↓しあい↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓の↑選手↑↓せんしゅ↓↑達↑↓たち↓のボールの↑投↑↓な↓げ↑方↑↓かた↓やけり↑方↑↓かた↓によって↑決↑↓|き↓まる|ものと↑信↑↓しん↓じられていたのです。
sdata.e: It was believed that the success of their crops depended on the way the players threw or kicked the ball during the game.

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓の↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑才能↑↓さいのう↓は↑遺伝↑↓いでん↓によって↑決↑↓|き↓まる|のですか。
sdata.e: Does a child's musical talent depend on heredity?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑子供↑↓こども↓ではないのに、あなたったらときど|きまる|で↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑子供↑↓こども↓であるかのような↑口↑↓くち↓のきき↑方↑↓かた↓をするのね。
sdata.e: I'm not a child, but sometimes you talk to me as if I were a child.
